listitem.para: If checked, translated segments will be marked in yellow.
If checked, untranslated segments will be marked in violet.
If checked, separations between paragraphs in the source document are indicated visually. See Preferences – .
Se si seleziona l'opzione, i segmenti di origine verrano mostrati e saranno evidenziati in verde. Se non si seleziona, i segmenti di origine non verranno mostrati.
If checked, non-unique segments will be marked in pale gray.
Se si seleziona l'opzione, i segmenti con note saranno evidenziati in ciano. Questo contrassegno ha la priorità sui contrassegni Evidenzia i segmenti tradotti ed Evidenzia i segmenti non tradotti.
If checked, non-breakable spaces will be displayed with a gray background.
Se si seleziona l'opzione, gli spazi vuoti saranno evidenziati con un punto.

varlistentry.term: Evidenzia caratteri di controllo algoritmo bidirezionale

listitem.para: Questa opzione mostra i caratteri di controllo bidirezionali
If checked, segments that have been auto-populated (from TMXs placed in for example) are marked in various colors.

That color marking is shown as long as Preferences –
is checked.

Normal translations inserted from the tm/auto folder are marked in orange. Other translations specifically identified in the TMX, can be marked in different colors. See the Request For Enhancement for technical details.

Underlines source terms that have a match in the glossaries. Hovering on an underlined term displays the matching target term. Right-clicking on an underlined term displays the matching target term, which can be selected and inserted at the cursor position in the target text.
Underlines parts of the target where LanguageTool has found errors. Vedere per dettagli.
Check this option in case OmegaT does not display certain glyphs properly (even if the fonts containing the relevant glyphs are installed on your machine).

note.para: On Windows this manual font fallback mechanism has been known to interfere with the standard font fallback, causing undesirable font substitutions. Per tale motivo, la sua impostazione predefinita è DISATTIVO.

listitem.para: Setting the Display Modification option to Current segment will display the time and the author of the last change made to the current segment. Setting it to All segments shows this information for all segments, while None turns this option off.

Restores the OmegaT main window layout to its default values, with the Editor pane on the left, the Fuzzy Matches pane at the top right and the Glossary pane at the bottom right. All other panes are minimized.

note.para: Use this function when you run into problems while rearranging the window layout.
